author: coar
msg: Update the filname column width-sizing piece of mod_autoindex
so that it's customisable with a NameLength keyword on the
IndexOptions directive.  A value of '*' means 'as wide as the
longest filename,' which was the default effect of the last
patch in this area.

author: stoddard
msg: Add symbols to symbol export list.

author: rse
msg: Recognize lowercase _and_ uppercase `uname' results under SCO OpenServer.
Submitted by: David Coelho <drc@ppt.com>
Reviewed by: Ralf S. Engelschall

author: martin
msg: As per Rick Ohnemus' <rick@ecompcon.com> suggestion in PR#2914,
apache now (logs and) ignores duplicate occurences of
"HTTP/1.0 200 OK" lines often generated by IIS servers.

author: martin
msg: Add conditionals around the newer module hooks. Since mod_example is
often taken as a starting point for module writers, it's best to keep
as much flexibility in here as possible. FIXME: The execution order of the
hooks is currently incomplete: the server_create / directory_create
hooks are not mentioned in the current numbering scheme.
Obtained from: mod_php3.c (current PHP3-3.0.4-dev)
